title: 求光影MOD
author: 是界是人
txt_content: 我想要一个光影MOD，我的版本是1.6.2.{:10_512:}

replies.author: waynede78
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... =%E5%85%89%E5%BD%B1

MOD放到mods文件夹  下面的配置文件放到shaderpakcs文件夹   游戏内ESC-选项-shaders选择光影

replies.author: z617308238
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=144894   下个整合包吧，光影mod我记得我以前都用不了贴图直接错误= =
